dataObjects.bibliographicCitation: Chaudhry, S. 2010. Badis chittagongis. In: IUCN 2014 . IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2014.1 . <www.iucnredlist.org>
dataObjects.description: Hill streams near Chittagong in Bangladesh, including the Matamohuri River drainage. No other material exist north of the type locality, in the adjacent Indian states of Tripura or Mizoram, or the eastern coast of Myanmar, but these areas are still to be properly surveyed (FishBase 2009).

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.description: Asia:  hill streams near Chittagong in Bangladesh.  No other material available east of the Ganges, adjacent Indian states of Tripura or Mizoram, or the eastern coast of Myanmar, but absence may be due to insufficient collecting.
dataObjects.references: Kullander, S.O. and R. Britz 2002 Revision of the family Badidae (Teleostei: Perciformes), with description of a new genus and ten new species. Ichthyol. Explor. Freshwat. 13(4):295-372. (Ref. 46238)

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Morphology
dataObjects.description: Dorsal spines (total): 16 - 18; Dorsal soft rays (total): 9 - 11; Analsoft rays: 6 - 9; Vertebrae: 28 - 29

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Size
dataObjects.title: Max. size
dataObjects.references: Kullander, S.O. and R. Britz 2002 Revision of the family Badidae (Teleostei: Perciformes), with description of a new genus and ten new species. Ichthyol. Explor. Freshwat. 13(4):295-372. (Ref. 46238)

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#DiagnosticDescription
dataObjects.description: Possesses a conspicuous dark blotch covering superficial part of cleithrum above the pectoral fin base; absence of a dark blotch on its dorsolateral aspect of caudal peduncle.  Body depth 29.8-34.0%SL; interorbital width 5.5-6.7%SL.A series of prominent dark blotches present along middle of dorsal fin.  Distal extrascapular present.

dataObjects.bibliographicCitation: Chaudhry, S. 2010. Badis chittagongis. In: IUCN 2014 . IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2014.1 . <www.iucnredlist.org>
dataObjects.description:
Red List Category
DD
Data Deficient

Red List Criteria

Version
3.1

Year Assessed
2010

Assessor/s
Chaudhry, S.

Reviewer/s
Jha, B.R., Allen, D.J., Datta, N.C., Britz, R., Dey, S.C. & Vishwanath, W.

Contributor/s
Molur, S.

Justification
Since Badis chittagongis is known only from two localities there is little information available on its population and distribution and therefore is assessed as Data Deficient. The species range may extend into India, but further work is required to confirm this.
